挭字的基本解释

挭
gěng
古同“梗”，梗概。
搅。

挭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gěng］
［《廣韻》古杏切，上梗，見。］
(1)搅挠。
(2)梗概。

挭字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　挭； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页431第25
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古杏切，音梗。攪也，撓也。與梗音同義別。本作?。

挭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
挭字的起名意思

暂无。

挭
gěng
The ancient same "stalk", summary.
stir.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gěng］
["Guangyun" ancient apricot cut, top stem, see you. ]
(1) Stirring.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　挭; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 431 25
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient apricot cut, sound stem. Stir it, scratch it. Synonymous with stalk sound. This work?.

Name meaning
Nothing.
gěng
fish-bones, things that stick in the throat; unyielding, blunt of speech; (Cant.) to stir, mix, agitate; to wade
